title: 148: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART: Episode 5 (Tour Bus Baby & We Quit)
itunes:title: 148: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART: Episode 5 (Tour Bus Baby & We Quit)
description:
The Broads cover episode 5 of LTYH and let’s be honest they are feisty and it’s hot takes city today. They recap, they yell about judge’s decisions, they cringe over dates, they defend their king and queen, they make predictions, they sing, and much more. 
*Join us THURSDAY for a “double date” with our partners as we answer a bunch of really awkward questions and laugh our asses off! 
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom 
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 
*** TALKSPACE: Go to Talkspace.com (http://talkspace.com/) or download the app and use code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month!
*** CARE/OF: For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TakeCareOf.com (http://takecareof.com/) and enter code chatty50
*** STAMPS.COM (http://stamps.com/) : Get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage AND a digital scale without any long-term commitment by going to Stamps.com (http://stamps.com/) clicking on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and typing in CHATTY
*** POLICY GENIUS: If you’re one of the many people looking to buy life insurance right now, but you’re not sure where to start, head to Policygenius.com (http://policygenius.com/) .
*** MEJURI: Head to http://mejuri.com/chatty for 10% off your first order

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
